<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=WHY%2BGOD%252C%2BWHY%2521%253F%2521%253F&channel=dklarations&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=4943414"></object><br/>Good news for DKlarations: He made it into orbit. Bad news for DKlarations: He forgot something really, really important. Find out what he forgot and his classic reaction to it in the video above.</p>
Oh that's awful. Tragic mistake for an iron man game.
Congratulations DK on the Twich Thursday spot!

see, this is exactly something I would do if I ever ran with TAC. so many Kerbals would starve to death

P.S.: his music playing in the clip is perfect

Edited August 22, 2014 by FleetAdmiralJ

Ooops!

Yeah, sometimes it really hurts to be forgetful.
...And that's why I'll never use Tac Life Support.
I loved the way his eyes bulged out (looking like a Kerbal) when he realized what he had done!
